items.sentence: What's the real reason that you don't want to sing?

Archaeologists found a papyrus scroll in the ruins.
This island belonged to France in the 19th century.
This flower is yellow, but all the others are blue.
However hard you try, you can't finish it in a day.
You never listen. I might as well talk to the wall.
Elephants are the largest land animals alive today.
A truck crashed into the flower shop near my house.
The problem is Tom never does what he's told to do.
Tom and Mary got married before John and Alice did.
I'm not the only one who thought we had to do that.
I thought that I might not be permitted to do that.
I stayed in bed because I wasn't feeling very well.

This is the first time I've ever asked Taninna out.
If you do your best, I'm sure you'll pass the exam.
